Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory670.jpg'}
{3: "At the festival's central plaza, after countless yawns, this tedious show finally comes to an end."}
{3: 'As the host drones on with a dull closing speech, the performers leave the stage with blank expressions. Only a smattering of applause breaks the silence.'}
{3: "Word is there's been a dispute over appearance fees, making the entire show feel especially slapdash."}
{3: 'The audience was hoping for some dramatic twist, but no one expected the performance to be this halfhearted right to the end.'}
{3: "Being the final major event, it's a real shame to see the festival end on such a lackluster note. Other visitors likely share that feeling, their faces reflecting a hint of disappointment."}
{3: "But you just feel that there's something far more thrilling waiting to be revealed..."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory802.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: "It's as though the neon signs along the street read your mind, flaring to life with an uncanny glow."}
{3: "The tourists heading out suddenly freeze, exchanging puzzled looks as they try to figure out what's going on."}
{3: "Then, an unexpected but strangely familiar voice crackles over the speakers, its vibrant energy overpowering the host's monotone script."}
{2: '??', 3: "Sure, we've never actually met before—but it still feels like it's been ages!"}
{2: '??', 3: 'Just before the curtain comes down, I want to ask everyone: Are you feeling happy today? Are you having a good time?'}
{2: '??', 3: "Maybe a few little mishaps got in the way, but don't lose heart—because the real excitement isn't over yet!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Visitor A', 3: "Wait, I thought every act on the schedule was done. What's happening now?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Visitor B', 3: 'Could this be some sort of surprise show?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The crowd perks up again, and everyone starts talking excitedly among themselves.'}
{3: "You realize it's more complicated than it seems. Instead of waiting with everyone else, you check both sides of the street and flag down an on-duty staff member."}
{2: '(Ask the on-duty staff member for more information)', 3: '27'}
{1: '1', 2: 'On-Duty Staff', 3: 'Gray Raven Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'They recognize you and anxiously explain the situation.'}
{2: 'On-Duty Staff', 3: "The communications system in this area has been hijacked, and the broadcast is stuck playing that recorded message—it won't shut off.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'On-Duty Staff', 3: "Oh no, oh no! I've seen scenes like this in movies. There must be someone planting a bomb nearby, and the second the broadcast mentions the show's about to start, boom—it'll go off for sure! We have to stop him, but we don't even know where he is...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Keep everyone calm. Leave the broadcast hijacker to me.', 3: '33'}
{2: 'On-Duty Staff', 3: 'Can you pinpoint where he is?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I have a pretty good idea...', 3: '35', 4: "I'm not entirely sure, but I'll give it a try.", 5: '35'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory686.jpg'}
{3: 'You head up to the top of the windmill, and there he is, just as you expected.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The Ascendant stands at the edge of the platform, looking out over the city. He seems to hear your footsteps and turns around, flashing a meaningful smile.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I never doubt you'll find me, but out of curiosity, how did you figure out I'd be here?", 4: '1'}
{3: "You step to the platform's edge and survey the city below. A neon-lit district catches your eye—its glow demands your attention."}
{2: "I just figure that if you're putting on a grand show,", 3: '44'}
{2: "you're definitely going to snag the best seat in the house for yourself.", 3: '45'}
{2: 'Is there any seat better than right here?', 3: '46'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Hahaha! A fantastic answer!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roland claps his hands loudly.'}
{2: 'So, what do you want to do?', 4: '...'}
{3: 'He traces an over-the-top smile in front of his mouth with one finger, then glides forward with measured steps.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "That last show was pretty boring, wasn't it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "It's a great festival day, and it shouldn't end on a regretful note.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I can't help adding one last scene at the end, so the whole script really leaves everyone feeling... satisfied.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Roland's voice grows unexpectedly quieter, almost whispery, like he's talking to himself."}
{3: 'With that over-the-top grin, he shakes his head and returns to his usual tone.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Ha, for a surprise, I guess I'm spilling a bit too much.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He bows theatrically, lifts his left hand to reveal a button that seems to have appeared from nowhere, and points at your eyes with his right hand.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Watch out—it will be a bit bright at first.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bright?'}
{3: 'Before you can figure out what he means, Roland vanishes and then appears right next to you.'}
{3: 'A pair of sunglasses suddenly sits on your nose, and Roland presses the button on the other side.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab', 2: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxTongyong/FxUiMemoryInformation.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiEnd.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab'}
{3: 'A burst of light floods the entire scene.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory802.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Visitor A', 3: 'Hey! Check out the sky!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Everyone looks up at once, and gasps spread through the crowd.'}
{3: 'Under the endless night sky, countless glowing magpies circle the windmill tower that seems to reach the heavens, glimmering like a sea of stars.'}
{3: 'They draw nearer, their feathers nearly brushing one another, until they form a magpie bridge that spans the entire sky.'}
{3: 'On the ground, visitors—and even the staff in charge of keeping order—all suddenly stop. They look up, captivated by this awe-inspiring spectacle.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory686.jpg'}
{3: 'Shaking off your initial astonishment, you reach out to the magpies circling overhead, only to watch your hands pass straight through.'}
{3: 'Some sort of projection...?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Haha! Looks like this little unauthorized stunt is really paying off!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Roland isn't wearing any device that lets him see what's going on down there."}
{3: "It feels like, for him, there's only one real audience for this whole performance, from start to finish."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'The Magpie Bridge—people say it can bring two distant souls together for just a short while...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'So please, let me make the most of it before it fades...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A swirl of projected magpies flutters upward, blocking your view.'}
{3: "In the next instant, Roland's voice echoes right by your ear."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Happy festival.', 4: '1'}
